landing.title: Welcome to Ruby Raider!
landing.subtitle: It is a gem that provides a generator and scaffolding to simplify UI test automation.

error.openProject: An error occurred while opening the project. Please try again.

alerts.invalidName: Please enter a valid project name.
alerts.selectFolder: Select a folder to save your project

newProject.title: Create a new project
newProject.subtitle: To create a project, first you need to select the following:

back.description: Go back to the previous step

installGuide.title: Installation Required
installGuide.message: You need to install both Ruby and Ruby Raider to run this application.
installGuide.information: Check our GitHub page or Website for installation instructions.

createProject.title: Creating a New Project
createProject.message: Here you can create a new project and start automating your tests.

openProject.title: Opening an Existing Project
openProject.message: Here you can open an existing project and continue automating your tests.

new.title: Start a New Project
new.message: Choose the different options in the selectors and create an automation framework.

mobileProject.title: Mobile Project
mobileProject.description: For now, mobile settings are not supported. They will come in newer versions of the app.
